title: MEWL HOUSE
description: M E W L H O U S E is a handmade, limited edition, collection of poems. The book employs Asian techniques in the shaping of this hand-sewn artifact. The cover is made of fine artisan Canal Paper of MONTRÉAL. The text is laser printed on 24 lb. linen paper made of 25% cotton. Each copy is signed by the author on the copyright page, and is numbered in the order in which the book was made. The book measures 7 ¼" x 9". There are 55 pages total, and includes 48 poems.
author: M. Sarki
